Text: Interesting mix here.  Also want to add if don't wish to open epub/mobi thru browser (and/or don't have a device), another SUPERB (and free) program to open/read, as well as CONVERT between formats, program is 'calibre' for both Mac OsX & Windows.  Thanks for the up, good stuff.
Request; "C" by Anna Benson. Swedish author, both Swedish and English language is good. Will be highly appreciated!
